name: Swissport International Ltd.
goal: Swissport International Ltd., on behalf of over 850 client-companies, provides best-in-class airport ground services for some 282 million passengers annually and handles approximately 4.8 million tons of air cargo at 122 warehouses world-wide. With a workforce of some 66,000 the world's leading provider of airport ground services and air cargo handling is active at more than 300 airports in 50 countries on six continents. In 2018 the Group generated a consolidated operating revenue of EUR 2.99 billion.
euInitiatives: Groundhandling, Cargo handling, Freight handling, Self-handling, Airports, Aviation, Transport, Market access
